2.title: Al to Dan, Deadwood
2.article: Whatever lurks ahead, whatever grievous abominations and discord, you and me walk into it together, like always.

1.title: Al, to Merrick, Deadwood
1.article: Pain or damage don’t end the world, or despair or f*cking beatin's.  The world ends when you're dead.  Until then, you got more punishment in store. Stand it like a man and give some back.
